column2: recursive_build <- function(data, IV, DV, depth, path = "") {
return(list(name = paste(path, ", Avg: ", leaf_avg, sep = ""), leaf = TRUE))
selected_var <- if (length(IV) > 1) select_var(data, IV, DV) else IV[1]
left_node <- recursive_build(left_data, IV[!IV %in% selected_var], DV, depth - 1, paste(path, selected_var, "=0"))
